snippet: The company said it would monitor its suppliers after a food safety scandal in the country hurt the chain’s sales and reputation.
abstract: McDonald's, responding to scandal involving food safety in China, names a new food safety officer and says it will monitor its suppliers in China more closely to prevent mishandling of food products.
lead_paragraph: The company said it would monitor its suppliers after a food safety scandal in the country hurt the chain’s sales and reputation.

headline.main: Mcdonald’s to Increase Oversight of Chinese Suppliers
